briefTitle: Personalized Follow-up After Breast Cancer Surgery Via Electronic Patient Reported Outcomes
officialTitle: Development of a Multidisciplinary Care Pathway With Postoperative Follow-up Via Electronic Patient Reported Outcomes (ePRO) of Complications of Breast Cancer Surgery to Optimise Patients' Quality of Life.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Specific needs of patients who have undergone breast cancer surgery : ePRO results
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female adult patients recruited from the gynecological or medical oncology department at Nîmes University Hospital who have undergone breast cancer surgery at least 6 months previous to their inclusion in the study and recruited during their post-operative follow-up consultations.
* All patients must have given written informed consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who have not undergone breast cancer surgery.
* Patients Under the age of 18.
* Patients who have not given written informed consent.
